column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Oh my goodness. First time in Chicago and first time going for deep dish. Stopped in right before heading to the airport to go home and got the lunch special takeout - was super quick
column3: and THE best pizza I've ever eaten. One personal pizza was enough for lunch and another meal on the plane... was sooo delicious both hot and cold. I usually prefer thin crust and was honestly not expecting much. Wish I'd known better and grabbed two!
